data.title: Desperate Teenage Lovedolls
data.meta_description: Check out the exclusive TV Guide movie review and see our movie rating for Desperate Teenage Lovedolls
data.text:
1984

1 hr 0 mins

Drama, Music, Comedy

NR

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Two girls rediscover their love for playing rock, find a drummer and begin practicing. When one of their mothers intervenes, they run away from home and are forced to fend for themselves on the streets against gangs and rival bands. Soon they are discovered and taken under the wing of rock manager Johnny Tremaine (played by Steven McDonald) who uses them for sex and his own aspirations of wealth. The Love Dolls set out to get revenge on those who have wronged them, and rise to the top of the roc
